duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct validation activities from RFQ phase to final customer acceptance of a defined project according to Valeo rules and international standards.
Analyze customer specifications and their impact on laboratory activities, collecting data from all design disciplines to define the validation plan.
Write detailed validation plans covering customer validation and Valeo risk analysis, also creating and maintaining technical standards within scope of ownership.
Participate in design reviews, continuous improvement, and innovation activities, as well as supporting engineering teams to solve technical issues and promote RAISE methodology.
Manage and develop the lab team, allocate staff, propose trainings and career evolutions, and contribute to the recruitment of lab members.
Ensure health & safety and 5S is respected, and demonstrate leadership in interfacing with an international network and customers.
Secure designs at platform levels, build a roadmap, and support system teams on complex projects for risk assessments and reliability demonstrations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor/Master in Electronics / Mechatronics or similar degree.
